nodes.text: The Hover Lifter Speeder was a transport vehicle which saw some use during the Galactic Civil War.
The speeder was mostly used to transport fuel cells on its flatbed, but it could also carry passengers brave enough to stand unharnessed on the platform.
The Hover Lifter Speeder is a vehicle that was added to the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies during the Death Troopers update of 2009.
